name: 吳建文
objective: This course provides the knowledge you need to understand the role of information systems in modern organizations, with particular focus on E-commerce and E-business. Along with skills learned in your functional area, knowledge from this course will help you effectively use information technology for solving business problems.
schedule:
Week 1~2: Foundations of Information Systems in Business
Week 3~6: Information Technologies
Week 7~9: Business Applications
Week 10~12: Development Processes
Week 13~14: Management Challenges
Week 15~18: Proect studies
scorePolicy:
Homework and Assignments: 20 %
Midterm Exam: 40 %
Final Project: 40 %:
materials:
Management Information Systems, 9th Edition
by James A. O'Brien,George Marakas
McGraw-Hill/Irwin
2008
